<JD_START>
Job Title: Join Our Culinary Team - City Cruises DC

Location: Washington, DC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Come Work With Us & Set Sail on a New Adventure! City Cruises is seeking talented individuals to join our team in our City Cruises Washington DC

Culinary Operations.

Join us for an open house and dive into the exciting world of culinary on the water!

About the Opportunity:

Are you looking for an exciting opportunity to start or advance your career in the culinary arts? Join our dynamic team and be part of a culinary environment where you can learn, grow, and showcase your talent! Positions Available:

Cook I

Entry Level / Cook IIExperience required

Responsibilities:

Assist in food preparation and cooking under the guidance of experienced chefs Maintain cleanliness and organization in the kitchen Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth kitchen operations Assist in expediting food orders and delivering dishes in a timely manner Willingness to take direction and learn from experienced chefs Follow all food safety and sanitation guidelines Qualifications:

High school diploma or equivalent. At least 1 year of experiences is preferred; culinary school graduates welcome Willingness to take direction and learn from experienced chefs Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a team and fast-paced environment. Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings, weekends, and holidays. Perks:

Comprehensive training program Opportunities for advancement and career growth Competitive pay Positive and supportive work environment Chance to work with a talented and passionate culinary team Apply now and embark on a journey of adventure!The RESPECT Service System embodies City Experiences' mission, vision, values and operating principles. By creating a company culture that puts RESPECT at its core, we believe it will drive us to achieve our goal of becoming a Global Experiences and Transportation Leader. City Experiences is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We prohibit discrimination and or/harassment of any type, including but not limited to discrimination and or harassment based upon race, religion, religious creed, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, pregnancy or relation medical conditions, childbirth, breastfeeding, parental status, veteran and/or military statue, disability (physical or mental) medical condition, genetic information or characteristics, political affiliation, domestic violence survivor status, marital status, or other characteristics prohibited by federal, state, or local law. Additional, City Experiences participates in the E-Verify program in certain locations. Pursuant to applicable State and local laws, including but not limited to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.PandoLogic. Keywords: Cook, Location: WASHINGTON, DC

20402

Experience Level (if available): None
